src:
Insiden Septic Tank Meledak Terjadi di Amerika, Tersambar Petir
05 Nov 2019, 15:42 by Tempo.co, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Insiden septic tank meledak juga pernah terjadi di Amerika Serikat. Laman USAToday, 6 Agustus 2019, mengabarkan bahwa toilet sebuah rumah di Florida meledak p ketika kilat menghantam septic tank mereka.
Ledakan itu dipicu oleh sambaran api ke gas metana di dalam septic tank, kata Jordan Hagadorn, pemilik bisnis perbaikan toilet, A-1 Affordable Plumbing Inc.
Seiring waktu, ketika orang menggunakan kamar mandi mereka, metana menumpuk di dalam tangki septik dan oetir adalah sumber api yang sempurna.
"Itu sangat menakutkan," kata Marylou Ward, pemilik rumah. "Ledakan itu sangat keras."
Ledakan menyebabkan kloset pecah berkeping-keping, begitu juga jendela kamar mandi.
Insiden septic tank meledak terjadi di Jakarta Timur. Seorang sopir jasa sedot WC meregang nyawa saat lubang septic tank meledak di rumah konsumennya di Kelurahan Jatinegara, Kecamatan Cakung, Jakarta Timur, Senin sore, 4 November 2019. Korban berinisial S, 44 tahun itu tewas di tempat dengan luka bakar di wajahnya.
USA TODAY | METRO
text:
Explosive Septic Tank Incident Occurred in America, Lightning
05 Nov 2019, 15:42 by Tempo.co, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The explosion of a septic tank has also occurred in the United States. Page USAToday, August 6, 2019, reported that the toilet of a house in Florida exploded when lightning hit their septic tank.
The explosion was triggered by a flash of fire into methane gas in the septic tank, said Jordan Hagadorn, owner of the toilet repair business, A-1 Affordable Plumbing Inc.
Over time, when people use their bathrooms, methane builds up in septic tanks and oysters are the perfect source of fire.
"That's very scary," said Marylou Ward, the owner of the house. "The explosion was very loud."
The explosion caused the toilet to burst into pieces, as did the bathroom window.
The explosion of a septic tank occurred in East Jakarta. A toilet suction service driver died when a septic tank exploded at his consumer's home in Jatinegara Sub-district, Cakung Sub-district, East Jakarta, Monday afternoon, November 4, 2019. The victim with the initials S, 44 years old was killed on the spot with a burn on his face.
USA TODAY | METRO
